price: 102. Maganeyünki adda addunyâ fanah madaara luk sugnaamal yeemene maray naggoowê loowot gacak nen iyyan.
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
